segments.text: I see the water just pouring over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in it, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless she’s being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are just making things worse by climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to break something if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve ever been caught before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be ruined if that water keeps running.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at them to stop, but I don’t think they’d listen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so clueless, it’s frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone comes in and turns off that faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
